original: chung ma la yang ngo zhes pa ni chung ma la yang zas byin yang bla bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: chung ma la yang ngo zhes pa ni chung ma la yang zas byin yang bla bar ston pa'o //

analyzed: 'di la byin zhes pa yin te bu chung ngu yod pa de lta bu la sdom pa byin cig pa'o //

analyzed: rab tu dbyung ba dang bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na'o zhes pa yin te rab tu 'byin cing bsnyen par rdzogs par byed na ltung bar 'gyur ba'o //

original: gang gi tshe de ltar 'gyur zhe na /
analyzed: gang gi tshe de ltar 'gyur zhe na /

analyzed: lo bcu gnyis su ma tshang la gong ma ltar byed na nyes par 'gyur ba'o //

original: ma tshang ba 'jog ba'o /
analyzed: ma tshang ba 'jog ba'o /

This means that if the previous actions are properly done, they are finished wherever they are.üîΩThe phrase the companions in the celibate life means that if the basis is the same, it is shown that they are suitable to be restored even if the earlier and later are reversed,

original: 'gron par 'dra la gong ma ltar snga phyi khyer yang slar bslas su rung bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: 'gron par 'dra la gong ma ltar snga phyi khyer yang slar bslas su rung bar ston pa'o //

original: cig shos pos mthun pa gsal zhes pa ni phyis 'ongs pa dag gis snga ma rnams 'du bar gsol cig pa'o //
analyzed: cig shos pos mthun pa gsal zhes pa ni phyis 'ongs pa dag gis snga ma rnams 'du bar gsol cig pa'o //
translated: The other said, ‚ÄúIt is clear that they agree,‚Äù meaning that the later arrivals should request the earlier ones to perform the po·π£adha.

analyzed: ma btub na mtshams gzhan du bya zhes pa ni gong ma ltar gsol te /
translated: If they are unable to do so, they should perform it in another boundary. This means that they should request as above.

analyzed: 'dur ma btub na gud du deng la gso sbyin gyis shig pa'o //
translated: If they are still unable to perform it, they should go elsewhere and perform the po·π£adha.

original: byed pa'i tshe 'ongs te lhag ma myong na yang 'grub ces pa ni gos spyin dang tshul nas 'byung ba byed pa'i tshe 'ongs te las kyi mjug myong zhing thos na yang bdag gis gso sbyin dang tshul nas 'byung pa 'am 'grub par ston pa'o //
analyzed: byed pa'i tshe 'ongs te lhag ma myong na yang 'grub ces pa ni gos spyin dang tshul nas 'byung ba byed pa'i tshe 'ongs te las kyi mjug myong zhing thos na yang bdag gis gso sbyin dang tshul nas 'byung pa 'am 'grub par ston pa'o //

This means that if they arrive while the po·π£adha and the prƒÅtimok·π£a are being performed, and experience the conclusion of the rite and hear it, then they have performed the po·π£adha and the prƒÅtimok·π£a.

original: gnas de nas su yang ma gyes na gdon mi za bar ro zhes pa ni snga ma gso sbyin byed pa su yang ma gyes par phyi mas rdzis na gdon mi za bar bslas dgos pa'o //
analyzed: gnas de nas su yang ma gyes na gdon mi za bar ro zhes pa ni snga ma gso sbyin byed pa su yang ma gyes par phyi mas rdzis na gdon mi za bar bslas dgos pa'o //
translated: If no one has left that place, they must certainly do it. This means that if no one who was performing the po·π£adha earlier has left, and the later arrivals perform it, they must certainly do it again.

original: lhags pa phal che na'o zhes pa ni phyis lhags pa phal che na yang gdon mi za bar bslas dgos pa'o //
analyzed: lhags pa phal che na'o zhes pa ni phyis lhags pa phal che na yang gdon mi za bar bslas dgos pa'o //
translated: When there is a great deal of wind means that even if there is a great deal of wind later, one should certainly repeat it.

original: dus kyi phyir ni mang ba brtsan no zhes pa ni gso sbyin gyi tshe tshes grangs la khas dum na gang mang ba brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: dus kyi phyir ni mang ba brtsan no zhes pa ni gso sbyin gyi tshe tshes grangs la khas dum na gang mang ba brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: For the sake of time, one should rely on the majority. This means that when the number of days is disputed at the confession ceremony, one should rely on the majority.

original: mnyam na gzhi ba'o zhes pa ni grangs mnyam na gzhi ba brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: mnyam na gzhi ba'o zhes pa ni grangs mnyam na gzhi ba brtsan par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: If they are equal, one should rely on the basis. This means that if the number is equal, one should rely on the basis.

original: 'dir yang ngo zhes pa ni mang ba brtsan ba 'am gzhi brtsan par bya ba gyi na 'am 'ol byir ma @177b yin gyi gdon mi za bar de bzhin du gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir yang ngo zhes pa ni mang ba brtsan ba 'am gzhi brtsan par bya ba gyi na 'am 'ol byir ma @177b yin gyi gdon mi za bar de bzhin du gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Here also, one should do it like this means that whether one relies on the majority or the basis, one should not be negligent or procrastinate, but should certainly do it like that.

original: gso sbyin gyi cho gar gtogs pa'o /
analyzed: gso sbyin gyi cho gar gtogs pa'o /
translated: This is the section on the confession ceremony.

original: // / da ni rnam par 'byed pa dang phran tshegs la sogs pa las kyi dngos por gtogs pa rnams bsdus te ston pa ni /
analyzed: // / da ni rnam par 'byed pa dang phran tshegs la sogs pa las kyi dngos por gtogs pa rnams bsdus te ston pa ni /
translated: Now, the section on the ritual procedures belonging to the miscellaneous and other topics is summarized and presented.

original: ting nge 'dzin las mi bslang zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
analyzed: ting nge 'dzin las mi bslang zhes pa la sogs pa yin te /
translated: Not to rise from meditative concentration and so on.

original: dge slong bsam gtan byed pa la kho na nyid kyi ched kyang rung gzhan gyi ched kyang rung ste byed pa'i mod la ma slong shig pa'o //
analyzed: dge slong bsam gtan byed pa la kho na nyid kyi ched kyang rung gzhan gyi ched kyang rung ste byed pa'i mod la ma slong shig pa'o //
translated: Do not meditate at the very moment when you are engaged in the practice of concentration, whether for your own sake or for the sake of others.

original: lung med par mi bsgom zhes pa ni lam bstan gleng ba la gsungs pa bzhin du /
analyzed: lung med par mi bsgom zhes pa ni lam bstan gleng ba la gsungs pa bzhin du /
translated: Do not meditate without the scriptures means: Do not meditate without the instruction of the path.

original: lung 'bogs pa med par ma bsgom shig pa'o //
analyzed: lung 'bogs pa med par ma bsgom shig pa'o //
translated: Do not meditate without the transmission means: Do not meditate without the transmission of the scriptures.

original: bum pa dang pho long bshams pa'i rigs so zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa lta bu nyid kyi gnyen po bya ba'i rigs par ston pa'o //
analyzed: bum pa dang pho long bshams pa'i rigs so zhes pa ni gong du bshad pa lta bu nyid kyi gnyen po bya ba'i rigs par ston pa'o //
translated: It is proper to set up a vase and a balloon means: It is proper to set up the antidote as explained above.

original: brtson 'grus mi klod ces pa ni dge ba ji brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus mi klod par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: brtson 'grus mi klod ces pa ni dge ba ji brtsams pa'i brtson 'grus mi klod par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: Do not relax your effort means: Do not relax your effort in whatever virtue you have begun.

original: 'di mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du 'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pas nyin mtshan thun du bklag cing brtson 'grus kyi yan lag rgyas par bshad pa bzhin du rig par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'di mdo las 'byung ba bzhin du 'o zhes pa ni rnal 'byor pas nyin mtshan thun du bklag cing brtson 'grus kyi yan lag rgyas par bshad pa bzhin du rig par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: As it occurs in the sutra, Yes, means: Know it as explained in the sutra, in the detailed explanation of the branch of effort, which the yogi should read in the day and night sessions.

original: sems dang yan lag dang gos btsums la nyal bar mi bya zhes pa ni nyal ba'i tshe na yang bgrang cing ma bzhag par gos yan chad bsdus shing sums la nyol cig pa'o //
analyzed: sems dang yan lag dang gos btsums la nyal bar mi bya zhes pa ni nyal ba'i tshe na yang bgrang cing ma bzhag par gos yan chad bsdus shing sums la nyol cig pa'o //
translated: Do not sleep with your mind, limbs, or clothes covered means that when you go to sleep, you should count the recitations and go to sleep with your clothes and limbs covered, without leaving them aside.

original: nyin par nad pa ma yin par mi nyal zhes pa dang / rked pa na bas pus 'khyud bcad zhes pa ni rgyab dang rked pa na bas phus 'khyud chor shig pa'o //
analyzed: nyin par nad pa ma yin par mi nyal zhes pa dang / rked pa na bas pus 'khyud bcad zhes pa ni rgyab dang rked pa na bas phus 'khyud chor shig pa'o //
translated: Do not sleep during the day unless you are sick and if you have a back or waistache, you may sleep with your knees drawn up to your chest.

original: nad pa ma yin pas nyal bar mi bya ba ste tsha ba'i dus dang / gnyid kyi snyom pa sel ba ni nyes med /
analyzed: nad pa ma yin pas nyal bar mi bya ba ste tsha ba'i dus dang / gnyid kyi snyom pa sel ba ni nyes med /
translated: Do not sleep unless you are sick, but it is not a fault to sleep during the hot season or to dispel drowsiness.üîΩThe sutras say:üîΩDo not attend to external things, do not be distracted, be clear and upright, and gather in your senses.üîΩIf you cannot do that, straighten your spine.

original: mdo las / phyi rol yid la mi byed pa dang ma yengs pa dang gsal zhing drang ba dang / dbang po sdud de bcag ces pa dang / mi nus na thig drang zhes pa dang / kha ton pa'i 'chag sa ni khru bcu gnyis zhes pa dang /
analyzed: mdo las / phyi rol yid la mi byed pa dang ma yengs pa dang gsal zhing drang ba dang / dbang po sdud de bcag ces pa dang / mi nus na thig drang zhes pa dang / kha ton pa'i 'chag sa ni khru bcu gnyis zhes pa dang /
translated: The walking path for reciters is twelve cubits.

original: spong ba pa'i ni khru bco brgyad ces dang / 'di 'ang thig btab la bya zhes pa ni spong ba la sogs pas 'di ltar gyis shig pa ste de la phyi rol yid la mi byed ces pa ni sems yul la ma yengs pa'o //
analyzed: spong ba pa'i ni khru bco brgyad ces dang / 'di 'ang thig btab la bya zhes pa ni spong ba la sogs pas 'di ltar gyis shig pa ste de la phyi rol yid la mi byed ces pa ni sems yul la ma yengs pa'o //
translated: Not attending to external things means that the mind is not distracted to objects.

original: ma yengs pa dngos su zad /
analyzed: ma yengs pa dngos su zad /
translated: Not distracted means actually exhausted.

original: gsal zhes pa ni sems dang nyams gsal ba'o //
analyzed: gsal zhes pa ni sems dang nyams gsal ba'o //
translated: Clear means the mind and experience are clear.

original: drang zhes pa ni mi 'gyur bar bcag pa'o //
analyzed: drang zhes pa ni mi 'gyur bar bcag pa'o //
translated: Straight means not crooked.

original: dbang po nang du sdud ces pa ni mig dang rna ba la sogs pa gya tshom du mi btang bar bsdus pa'o //
analyzed: dbang po nang du sdud ces pa ni mig dang rna ba la sogs pa gya tshom du mi btang bar bsdus pa'o //
translated: Gathering the senses inward means not letting the eyes, ears, and so forth wander but gathering them in.

original: dge slong gis 'dug la chos bshad @178a * //
analyzed: dge slong gis 'dug la chos bshad @178a * //
translated: The monk should sit and explain the Dharma.

original: ces pa 'gron pa thug phrad kyis gtam zer ba lta bu 'greng zhing mi 'chad par 'dug la shod cig pa'o //
analyzed: ces pa 'gron pa thug phrad kyis gtam zer ba lta bu 'greng zhing mi 'chad par 'dug la shod cig pa'o //
translated: This means that one should not explain the Dharma while standing, like a traveler who is asked for news while meeting someone.üîΩEven if there are many, one should explain it.

original: du ma na yang gcig gis so zhes pa ni 'chad nus pa'i 'os du ma zhig yod na yang gcig gis shod cig pa'o //
analyzed: du ma na yang gcig gis so zhes pa ni 'chad nus pa'i 'os du ma zhig yod na yang gcig gis shod cig pa'o //
translated: This means that even if there are many suitable to explain it, one should explain it.

original: su yang rung zhes pa ni du ma 'khod pa la gang gis bshad kyang rung bar ston pa'o //
analyzed: su yang rung zhes pa ni du ma 'khod pa la gang gis bshad kyang rung bar ston pa'o //
translated: Anyone indicates that it is suitable for anyone to explain to a group of many people.üîΩIf it is not by his invitation, not without being asked means that when the Sa·πÖgha is invited for the sake of a certain monk, it is suitable to explain even without being asked by him, but not like that.

original: de'i dor bos pa ma yin na ma gsol bar ma yin zhes pa ni dge slong 'ga' zhig gi ngor dge 'dun spyan drangs pa'i tshe des ma gsol bar bshad kyang bla'i de lta bu'i ma yin bar phas ma gsol tam ma glengs par chus bab bab duüîΩma 'chad cig pa'o //
analyzed: de'i dor bos pa ma yin na ma gsol bar ma yin zhes pa ni dge slong 'ga' zhig gi ngor dge 'dun spyan drangs pa'i tshe des ma gsol bar bshad kyang bla'i de lta bu'i ma yin bar phas ma gsol tam ma glengs par chus bab bab du ma 'chad cig pa'o //
translated: Without being asked by him, or without mentioning it, do not explain it suddenly.

original: 'gen phag tu ma yin zhes pa ni mi phal 'khod pa'i nang nas sde sder bcad cing so sor 'chad par ma byed cig pa'o //
analyzed: 'gen phag tu ma yin zhes pa ni mi phal 'khod pa'i nang nas sde sder bcad cing so sor 'chad par ma byed cig pa'o //
translated: Not in a hidden place means do not explain separately, having divided the assembly of ordinary people.

original: phyed shas su ma yin zhes pa ni chos 'chad pa'i 'khor gcig la bshad pa kha gnyis su ma byed cig pa'o //
analyzed: phyed shas su ma yin zhes pa ni chos 'chad pa'i 'khor gcig la bshad pa kha gnyis su ma byed cig pa'o //
translated: Not in a half-hidden place means do not explain to one part of the assembly of Dharma students, while excluding another part.

original: gnyis lhan cig du ma yin zhes pa ni mi gnyis cig car kha bstams te ma 'chad cig pa'o //
analyzed: gnyis lhan cig du ma yin zhes pa ni mi gnyis cig car kha bstams te ma 'chad cig pa'o //
translated: Not together with two means do not explain with two people facing each other.

original: rgan gral nas so zhes pa ni 'chad pa'i gral rgan rabs kyi go nas shod cig pa'o //
analyzed: rgan gral nas so zhes pa ni 'chad pa'i gral rgan rabs kyi go nas shod cig pa'o //
translated: The phrase from the place of the elders means speak from the place of the elders in the teaching row.

original: phal che na gnyis gsum go bzhag nas so zhes pa ni rgan rabs mang po zhig 'khod na gong du gnyis gsum tsam bzhag pa'i 'og tu 'dug la shod cig pa'o //
analyzed: phal che na gnyis gsum go bzhag nas so zhes pa ni rgan rabs mang po zhig 'khod na gong du gnyis gsum tsam bzhag pa'i 'og tu 'dug la shod cig pa'o //
translated: If there are many elders, set up two or three and speak below them. This means that if there are many elders, set up two or three of them above and speak below them.

original: thams cad kyis de lta 'am zhe na /
analyzed: thams cad kyis de lta 'am zhe na /
translated: If you ask, Is it like that for everyone?

original: go de na med na'o zhes pa yin te gral rims kyis der mi bab pa zhig na gdod de ltar gyis sheg pa'o //
analyzed: go de na med na'o zhes pa yin te gral rims kyis der mi bab pa zhig na gdod de ltar gyis sheg pa'o //
translated: It is said, If there is no place there. If there is no place in the row for you, then do it that way.

original: seng ge'i stan la yang ngo zhes pa ni chos 'chad pa'i seng ge'i stan la 'dug ste shod cig pa'o //
analyzed: seng ge'i stan la yang ngo zhes pa ni chos 'chad pa'i seng ge'i stan la 'dug ste shod cig pa'o //
translated: Also on the lion seat. This means speak while sitting on the lion seat of teaching the Dharma.

original: mchil snod gzhag ces pa dang 'dir gzhi gding zhes pa dang / bye ma las ma thal ba'o zhes pa dang / dus dus su bkru zhes pa ngang chos 'chad pa'i mchil snod 'di lta bu gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: mchil snod gzhag ces pa dang 'dir gzhi gding zhes pa dang / bye ma las ma thal ba'o zhes pa dang / dus dus su bkru zhes pa ngang chos 'chad pa'i mchil snod 'di lta bu gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The phrase set up a spittoon and here the phrase spread a base, and not from sand, and wash from time to time, mean make a spittoon like this for teaching the Dharma.

original: mtshan mo chos bsgrag par bya zhes pa dang / tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga'o zhes pa ni tshes grangs 'di dag yal nangs su chos bsgrags par gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: mtshan mo chos bsgrag par bya zhes pa dang / tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi 'am bco lnga'o zhes pa ni tshes grangs 'di dag yal nangs su chos bsgrags par gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The line one should proclaim the Dharma at night and on the eighth, fourteenth, or fifteenth day of the month means that one should proclaim the Dharma on these days of the month.

original: nad pas 'di ma byas bla zhes pa ni nad pas ni chos bsgrags pa ma byas kyang bla ba'o ;
analyzed: nad pas 'di ma byas bla zhes pa ni nad pas ni chos bsgrags pa ma byas kyang bla ba'o ;
translated: The line one may omit this if one is sick means that if one is sick, one may omit the proclamation of the Dharma.

original: ;'di bshad pa'i phyir bskul na khas mi blang ba ma yin zhes pa ni khang skyong ba lta bu la sogs pas chos bshad par bskul na rang red ma byed par khas longs shig pa'o //üîΩmi nus pa la sogs pa zhig na bsgo ba la las bshags zhes pa ni bdag brel tam mi nus pa la sogs pa'i rkyen @178b cig yod na /
analyzed: ;'di bshad pa'i phyir bskul na khas mi blang ba ma yin zhes pa ni khang skyong ba lta bu la sogs pas chos bshad par bskul na rang red ma byed par khas longs shig pa'o // mi nus pa la sogs pa zhig na bsgo ba la las bshags zhes pa ni bdag brel tam mi nus pa la sogs pa'i rkyen @178b cig yod na /
translated: But one should not refuse to accept an invitation to teach, saying I am not able to do this. This means that if one is invited to teach by a caretaker of a temple and so on, one should accept, without saying I am not able to.

original: khang skyong lta bu la sogs pas bsgo ba la shad kyis 'byong shig pa'o //
analyzed: khang skyong lta bu la sogs pas bsgo ba la shad kyis 'byong shig pa'o //
translated: If one is unable to do this because of illness and so on, one should confess one's transgression of the rule. This means that if one is unable to do this because of illness or some other reason, one should confess one's transgression of the rule to the caretaker of the temple and so on.

original: 'chad pa ni res su bklag cing 'chad du gzhug ces pa ni gcig gis 'chad mi nus na res su lhogs la shod cig pa'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa ni res su bklag cing 'chad du gzhug ces pa ni gcig gis 'chad mi nus na res su lhogs la shod cig pa'o //
translated: The phrase one should read and cause to be read means that if one is unable to explain, one should read in turn and then explain.

original: mthar na tshigs bcad re re yang ngo zhes pa ni tshigs bcad re re tsam gyi tshod bshad nus na yang res su lhogs shig pa'o //
analyzed: mthar na tshigs bcad re re yang ngo zhes pa ni tshigs bcad re re tsam gyi tshod bshad nus na yang res su lhogs shig pa'o //
translated: The phrase at least a verse means that if one is able to explain at least a verse, one should read in turn and explain.

original: 'dir me mar bud ces pa dang / mthongs su chos mnyan ba'i gral zla gam mam rdzing bu ltar byas zhes pa ni chos bshad pa'i sar me mar bud pa dang / bshad pa'i gral thabs 'di ltar gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir me mar bud ces pa dang / mthongs su chos mnyan ba'i gral zla gam mam rdzing bu ltar byas zhes pa ni chos bshad pa'i sar me mar bud pa dang / bshad pa'i gral thabs 'di ltar gyis shig pa'o //
translated: The phrase the lamp is lit and the rows of listeners to the Dharma are like a half-moon or a pond means that the lamp is lit in the place where the Dharma is explained, and that one should arrange the rows for the explanation in this way.

original: bla gab med par chos 'chad na bla re bre zhes pa dang / char 'ong na brtul zhes pa dang / de nas chos nyan pa mi btang zhes pa dang / gnas brtan dang por song la cung zad mi smra bar bsdad nas des chos bshad pa 'am dge slong gzhan la chos smras so zhes bskul zhes pa ni bla gab med par chos 'chad pa'i tshe char 'od na gnas spong ba dang /
analyzed: bla gab med par chos 'chad na bla re bre zhes pa dang / char 'ong na brtul zhes pa dang / de nas chos nyan pa mi btang zhes pa dang / gnas brtan dang por song la cung zad mi smra bar bsdad nas des chos bshad pa 'am dge slong gzhan la chos smras so zhes bskul zhes pa ni bla gab med par chos 'chad pa'i tshe char 'od na gnas spong ba dang /
translated: If one teaches the Dharma in the open air and it rains, one should move to a sheltered place.

original: gud du bshad pa'i drod gnas brtan gyis bzung ba la tshogs pa thabs 'di ltar gyis shig par ston pa'o //
analyzed: gud du bshad pa'i drod gnas brtan gyis bzung ba la tshogs pa thabs 'di ltar gyis shig par ston pa'o //
translated: This is the method for the community to follow when the elder is in charge of the teaching.üîΩIf one listens to the teaching and it is in accordance with the Dharma, one should be enthusiastic.üîΩIf it is not, one should stop it.

original: 'chad pa mnyan nas gal te chos bzhin na spro bar bya zhes pa dang / ma yin na bzlog ces pa ni chos bzhin du 'chad na gzengs bstod pa dang / log par 'chad na slar zlog shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'chad pa mnyan nas gal te chos bzhin na spro bar bya zhes pa dang / ma yin na bzlog ces pa ni chos bzhin du 'chad na gzengs bstod pa dang / log par 'chad na slar zlog shig pa'o //
translated: If the teaching is in accordance with the Dharma, one should praise it. If it is not, one should stop it.

original: 'dir khyim pa dag lhags na chos kyi gtam bya zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang du khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags na chos kyi gtam glengs shig pa'o //
analyzed: 'dir khyim pa dag lhags na chos kyi gtam bya zhes pa ni gtsug lag khang du khyim bdag 'ongs shing lhags na chos kyi gtam glengs shig pa'o //
translated: Here, if householders come, one should speak of the Dharma means that if householders come and arrive at the monastery, one should discuss the Dharma.

original: mu stegs pa spogs shing rgol na 'khrul cing smad pa mi bstan par tshar gcod ces pa ni mu stegs pa rgol zhing spogs na 'phral du ma khro bar gzhung dang rigs pas tshar chod rab tu gyis shig pa'o //
analyzed: mu stegs pa spogs shing rgol na 'khrul cing smad pa mi bstan par tshar gcod ces pa ni mu stegs pa rgol zhing spogs na 'phral du ma khro bar gzhung dang rigs pas tshar chod rab tu gyis shig pa'o //
translated: If non-Buddhists argue and dispute, one should not teach confusedly or contemptuously, but defeat them means that if non-Buddhists argue and dispute, one should not immediately get angry, but thoroughly defeat them with scriptures and reasoning.

original: ston pas 'khor khrid la mi 'gro zhes pa ni bdag gi khyim du chos mnyan pa'i 'khor phyi bzhin du mi bkri shig pa'o //
analyzed: ston pas 'khor khrid la mi 'gro zhes pa ni bdag gi khyim du chos mnyan pa'i 'khor phyi bzhin du mi bkri shig pa'o //
translated: One should not lead a retinue when the Teacher is leading, means that one should not lead a retinue of Dharma listeners following behind oneself to one's own house.

original: 'di dag lhags na chos kyi don la gzud ces pa ni bdag gis ni ma khrid kyi khong ta rang dgar lhags na chos kyi ched la chung cig pa'o //

original: gong du gding ba bya'o zhes smos pa de gang zag ji lta bus gding du mi rung ba ji ston pa ni 'dir mi skye ba ni dbyar ma byas pa dang / dbyar chad pa dang / dbyar phyi ma dang / gnas gzhan du dbyar lon pa rnams so zhes pa yin te ming gis smos pa 'di rnams lta bu'i gang zag gis gtan pa gding du mi rung ste /

translated: One who has not entered the rainy season retreat, one who has ended the rainy season retreat, one who has entered the rainy season retreat for a second time, and one who has entered the rainy season retreat in another location.

analyzed: dbyar phyi ma zhes pa ni tshul phyi ma'o //
translated: One who has ended the rainy season retreat means one who has not completed the rainy season retreat, has left the rainy season retreat, or the rainy season retreat has ended.üîΩOne who has entered the rainy season retreat for a second time means one who has already completed the rainy season retreat.

translated: If one is not at the end of the boundary, or if one is placed in another place, such as a novice monk, or if one is placed in another place, or if one does not perform the rainy season retreat, or if the rainy season retreat has ended, or if one is in the latter rainy season, one should not spread the mat.
